update.title: Version 1.54 Released to the App Store
update.body:
There is currently an update rolling out to the App Store which includes but is not limited to:
- Bug fixes
- A couple new features

testflight.title: Version 1.55 Released to Testflight
testflight.body:
There is currently an update rolling out to TestFlight which includes but is not limited to:
- Bug fixes
- A couple new features
